sentences.en: "Daring Adventures" from '86 is a far more cohesive and successful album.
sentences.cn: 1986年发行的《勇于冒险》是一张风格更为统一也更为成功的专辑。

sentences.en: Both tracks are remixed versions of tracks from her forthcoming album.
sentences.cn: 两首曲目都是她即将推出的专辑歌曲的混音版本。

sentences.en: Graeme Naysmith has produced two of the ten tracks on this album.
sentences.cn: 格雷姆·内史密斯创作了这张专辑十首歌中的两首。

sentences.en: He co-produced the album with Bowie.
sentences.cn: 他和鲍伊联袂打造了这张专辑。

sentences.en: He returned the album to its place on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 他把相册放回架子上原来的地方。

sentences.en: His third album is by far his most interesting.
sentences.cn: 他的第三张专辑是迄今最有味道的。

sentences.en: Making the album was a real blast.
sentences.cn: 做这个专辑真是一种乐趣。

sentences.en: On a shelf beneath he spotted a photo album.
sentences.cn: 他在下面的架子上瞅见了一本相册。

sentences.en: The band plan to release their new album next week.
sentences.cn: 该乐队计划下周发行他们的新专辑。

sentences.en: The band's third album seems more disciplined and focussed.
sentences.cn: 这个乐队的第三张专辑似乎表现更为节制、基调更为清晰。

sentences.en: The group's debut album was immediately acclaimed a hip hop classic.
sentences.cn: 这个组合的首张专辑一经推出便被盛赞为嘻哈乐的经典之作。

sentences.en: Their new album features remixes of some of their previous hits.
sentences.cn: 新专辑主要收录了一些他们曾风靡一时的老歌的混音版本。

sentences.en: This album has hardly dated at all.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑几乎一点都不过时。

sentences.en: This album is bright, breezy and playful.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑音乐轻松明快，趣味十足。

sentences.en: This is a fabulous album. It's fresh, varied, fun.
sentences.cn: 这张专辑真棒，新颖、有趣且富于变化。

sentences.en: This is my favourite live album of all time.
sentences.cn: 这是我最喜爱的现场专辑。

trans.tran_en: a book that you put photographs, stamps etc in
